thread.title: Lord Ashcroft hospitalised with kidney failure: Peer unable to attend Call Me Dave book launch
thread.title_full: Lord Ashcroft hospitalised with kidney failure: Peer unable to attend Call Me Dave book launch - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Lord Ashcroft hospitalised with kidney failure: Peer unable to attend Call Me Dave book launch
text: Lord Ashcroft has missed the launch of the controversial biography of David Cameron which he co-authored, after it emerged he has been in intensive care for 18 days. The peer suffered liver and kidney failure as well as septic shock, and is currently recovering in the US, organisers of the Call Me Dave book launch in London told The Telegraph. He is now "out of danger", they added. LBC presenter Iain Dale represented Lord Ashcroft at the event. More to follow More about: lord ashcroft Call Me Dave
